message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this incredible product that I think you'll love. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm afraid I can't accept $700000. I'm willing to compromise, though. I'll offer you the product for $820000. This is a fair price considering the product's unique features and the value it brings. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to own something truly special.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I still think $820000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $760000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value without breaking the bank.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not comfortable accepting $760000. I'll offer you a revised price of $800000. This is a compromise that I believe reflects the product's value and is still a great opportunity for you to own something unique. I'm willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to work with me, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with $800000. I'm willing to meet you at $780000, but I think that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
